pr_title: Fixes #3704: Green pins seen on initial "Nearby" map, despite "Needs …

timeline.message: Fixes #3704: Green pins seen on initial "Nearby" map, despite "Needs Photos" selected

timeline.bodyText: Hmm, as far as I can see at first sight this won't cause an NPE since currentLocationMarker is only used in addCurrentLocationMarker and nullcheck is being made inside of this method, already.
timeline.author: neslihanturan

replies.bodyText:
Hi @neslihanturan
I don't see where NPE could occur.
replies.author: VitalyVPinchuk
